ccre.ctrl

Class ModeDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.ctrl.ModeDispatcher

  • public class ModeDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    A provider for a system that routes fired events along to one of a set of specified events based on the current 'mode' of the dispatcher.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  ModeDispatcher.Node
      A node representing a specific EventSource's routed EventSources.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int currentMode
      The current mode.
      protected java.util.Hashtable<EventSource,ModeDispatcher.Node> dispatches
      All the currently routed EventSources and their nodes.
      protected java.lang.String[] modenames
      The names of the states of the ModeDispatcher.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModeDispatcher(int defaultMode, java.lang.String... modenames)
      Create a new ModeDispatcher with the specified mode to start at, and the specified list of nodes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventSource[] getSources(EventSource event)
      Create routes for each mode and the specified event.
      void setMode(int mode)
      Change the mode to the specified index.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • modenames

        protected final java.lang.String[] modenames
        The names of the states of the ModeDispatcher. The names are not currently used, although the length is.

      • currentMode

        protected int currentMode
        The current mode. In the range 0<=currentMode<modenames.length

      • dispatches

        protected java.util.Hashtable<EventSource,ModeDispatcher.Node> dispatches
        All the currently routed EventSources and their nodes. Used to cache so that only one Node is allocated for each EventSource.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModeDispatcher

        public ModeDispatcher(int defaultMode,
              java.lang.String... modenames)
        Create a new ModeDispatcher with the specified mode to start at, and the specified list of nodes.
        Parameters:
        defaultMode - the mode to start at.
        modenames - the list of modes.

    • Method Detail

      • getSources

        public EventSource[] getSources(EventSource event)
        Create routes for each mode and the specified event. The 0th route will be fired when the mode is 0 and the specified event is fired, the 1st route will be fired when the mode is 1 and the specified event is fired, and so on.
        Parameters:
        event - the event that fires the corresponding route.
        Returns:
        the created routes.

      • setMode

        public void setMode(int mode)
        Change the mode to the specified index.
        Parameters:
        mode - the new mode.
